g.style: font-family: verdana, arial, sans; font-size: 15px; font-weight:normal; fill: black
g.text: Flight tickets for an airline are coded as follows:
UK flights are coded A, European Destinations B, Asian Destinations C, and
If a flight takes place between 10 pm and 6 am, the same codes are used
but with lower case letters (a,b,c, and d).
Male passengers are coded X and female passengers are coded Y.
Children are coded by the same letters in lower case (x.y).
Meals are coded as follows: European meal G, Asian Meal H, Vegetarian
Meal K. Children's meals coded by the same letters in lower case (g,h,k)
First Class passengers are coded P, Business Class Q, and economy R.
